message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe will be highly valuable to your business.  My asking price is $1,150,000. I understand this is a significant investment, but I'm confident that the product's potential return will exceed your expectations. Please let me know your decision at your earliest convenience.  If you're not interested, I have another buyer lined up who is willing to purchase it for $1,000,000.
